description: In my opinion it's one of the best web browsers. Its UI is similiar to Opera 12.x UI, it contains useful features. I really recommend it.

Overall I like Otter, it's very fast. I really hate online-ads they are basically spyware now! It's a lot like OLD Opera 12.x which I loved several years ago - Avoid Opera Now since they sold-out to China which requires users agree to being spied on. I use Vivaldi (Like Old Opera 12) a lot with uBlock Orgin, uBlock Matrix, Disconnect.me and Privacy Badger which lets me Block around 98% of the ads encountered. Granted a little code digging may be required at times. When Otter gets better ad blocking -- I'll be back.
summary: Good Browser, but does not block all adverts

description: The thing that I don't like about it is that you cannot "Open a specific page or set of pages" like Chrome and Firefox do.
